paristo - (28/04/2009 08:58): #set($docname = "Space.Page")  
paristo - (28/04/2009 08:58): #set($doc = $xwiki.getDocument($docname))  
paristo - (28/04/2009 08:58): $doc.insertText("Test", "Test2")  
paristo - (28/04/2009 08:59): but it doesnt seem to work ( at least it doesnt insert any text to my page)

jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:43): sdumitriu: jvdrean I'm going to move the compatibily.js <script> tag at the very end of javascript.vm, after the \*SX placeholders  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 16:44): +1  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:44): any protests, potential drawbacks ?  
jvdrean - (28/04/2009 16:44): +1  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:44): and I'm going to switch the placeholders for SX and FSX  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 16:45): +1  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:45): so that SX that needs scriptaculous or other lib stop complaining there things are not defined  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:45): ok  
jvdrean - (28/04/2009 16:45): +1 too, putting fsx after sx was a mistake  
vmassol - (28/04/2009 16:47): jvelociter: don't forget to add comments that explain why it's in that order ;)  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:47): yep  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:47): I'm writing comments right now :)

anamarias - (28/04/2009 17:04): sdumitriu: Hi. I just wanted to let you know that I got the e-mail about the Open Social documentation, but I've been a bit busy with school the past few days. I've started to read them just now.  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 17:04): K  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 17:04): I've also started to read them  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 17:04): ah, ok  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 19:52  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 19:52): XWIKI-3521

arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:08): sdumitriu : hello  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:09): Hi arunreddy  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:09): Busy with school?  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:09): Sem exams  
anamarias joined #xwiki at 20:09  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:10): Hai   
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:11): Hi  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 20:11): thx for xwikibot sergiu ;)  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:12): what all can XWikibot do.  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:12): XWiki jira 3418  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:13): help  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:13): jira 3418  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:13): XWIKI 3418  
marta\_ joined #xwiki at 20:13  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:13): XWIKI-3418  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:13): It's like this: XWIKI-3418  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:14): XWIKI-3606  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:14): XWIKI-3257  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:14): XWIKI-3080  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:16): sdumitriu : is the confluence parser used anywhere else in the xwiki as of now.  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:16): No  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:17): None of those tools have been used ?  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:17): No  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:17): OK :)  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:17): time for some serious hacking  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:19): sdumitiru:I need to clear some doubts about the "mostRecent filed in XwikiDocument.java. Problem is when we update a document the mostRecent field is true for both of the versions. Feel like its not reseting to false in the doc updating process. Any hints :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:24): I added these line in the version column historyinline.vm to just test it." #if ($tdoc.isMostRecent()) current #end" then it want make any difference. all rows appear as "current"  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:25): That's not needed  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:25): Compare $tdoc.version with the current version  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:26): $tdoc is the same object, it doesn't change  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:26): So it will always be mostRecent  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:28): ok. :)  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 20:29  
marta\_ left at 20:30 ("Leaving.")  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:34): sdumitriu : Do we use wikimodel project for parsing.?  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:34): Yes  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:34): http://code.google.com/p/wikimodel/  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:42): sdumitriu:I got it correct :) "#if ($tdoc.getRCSVersion()==$version)"  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:42): Thanks for the help :)  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:44): You're welcom  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:44): e  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:44): sdumitriu:Where is the best place to display the "current" label  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:46): is it ok to display inside the version column with the version.  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:47): Yes  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:47): You should also add a CSS classname to the row  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:47): So that it can be styled differently  
vmassol left at 20:47 ()  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:47): ya like "new" in Recent document :)

sdumitriu1 is now known as sdumitriu ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection))  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:56): GSoC students, I've decided to try to do a project along with you, as an example  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:56): http://gsoc.myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Main/WebHome  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 20:56): wow thats really nice   
anamarias - (28/04/2009 20:56): what kind ?  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 20:57): :)  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 20:57): Read about it on the blog  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 20:58): great initiative Sergiu  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 20:58): I'm ok to be your mentor btw ;)  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 20:59): sometimes gsoc.myxwiki.org works very slow for me  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:00): even not loading at all  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:00): yep, we know that, we tried fixing it this afternoon  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 21:00): me too. Its too slow   
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:00): are you still experiencing the slowness issue as of now?  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:00): me, right now  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:00): indeed, it's slow right now  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 21:00): still loading  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:00): (trying to log in actually)  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:00): It's caused by a bug in Velocity, combined with the way we use it, and combined with a wrong macro written by a farm user  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:01): We don't know where's that macro yet  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:01): well, here's a game for you gsocers  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:01): first one to identify the slow loading macro on myxwiki.org wins  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:02): is it like this only on myxwiki ?  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:02): It seems so  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:02): Hm, xwikibot isn't logging  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:02): sergiu: what about making a full copy of myxwiki.org database, zipping it, making it available as a torrent, first one who finds the bug is declared the winner?  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:03): might be some content privacy issues, but since it's a community farm... well well well  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:04): hehe, I just got a toy robot :) !  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:04): called Skol  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 21:05): i got a HTTP Status 500   
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 21:05): what is skol  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:05): Hi,  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:05): I'am Skol, the XWiki administrator.  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:05): The service you tried to reach is down for maintenance.  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:05): It will be back soon and will be faster and more stable.   
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 21:06  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:06): xwikibot: Say something  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 21:07  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 21:07): XWiki-1234  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:08): No you didn't  
arunreddy - (28/04/2009 21:08): what happend to bot.  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:08): :))  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:08): news  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:10): Hm, it actually logs, but it doesn't get displayed  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:10): Oh, yeah, found the problem  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:10): jvelociter - (28/04/2009 16:43): sdumitriu: jvdrean I'm going to move the compatibily.js <script> tag at the very end of javascript.vm, after the \*SX placeholders  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 21:11): yes  
xwikibot joined #xwiki at 21:11  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 21:11): haha, funny one  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 21:12): now we know how to close big brother's eyes ;)  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:12): I'll fix the display  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:14): Done  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:15): So myxwiki still crashes  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:15): I'll have to dig into the Velocity engine to see how I can fix the deadlock...  
jvelociter - (28/04/2009 21:25): couldn't it be a page that does something nasty ?  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:25): Yes, it could  
glerouge - (28/04/2009 21:32): but we've got no way of finding out which one would be the culprit so far, do we?  
vmassol left at 21:32 ()  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 21:36): I'm going to sleep now. Good night everyone :). Hope to see u tomorrow  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:36): Good night  
anamarias - (28/04/2009 21:36): bye :)  
ChathuraPrabuddh - (28/04/2009 21:37): bye tc :)

sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:55): Go fix 5 bugs  
sdumitriu - (28/04/2009 21:55): :p
